body: It doesn't seem to make a difference.

I have upgraded to 0.4.2-dev and now fonts look ugly
![DeepinScreenshot_select-area_20200218154454](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18271144/74788102-cfa67f00-52a8-11ea-8449-52d80fa743e6.png)

Left  - Before (0.4.1)
Right - After (0.4.2-dev)

If this is a different issue or can be fixed with a setting - please point me in the right direction!
It seems like metrics on your screen shot are strange. Could you share your config?
@ngortheone it'll be also nice if you can do a bisect.

issue.title: Fix discarding of FreeType loading flags

body: Also, the glyph `❯` isn't from Terminus font, it's from some scalable fallback font, so it's not a bitmap font rendering issue.

> Could you test #3359 ?

Yes, it's fixed!

>Also, the glyph ❯ isn't from Terminus font, it's from some scalable fallback font, so it's not a bitmap font rendering issue.

Oh, i see. That explains why everything else looked normal.
@ngortheone if you still has issues with the latest master, let me know.
